title: Attention Assessment

elements.name: intro_text
elements.title:
Welcome to the Attention Assessment

This assessment measures your ability to focus and sustain attention. Please answer each question thoughtfully.

elements.name: self_perceived_attention_span
elements.title: How would you rate your ability to maintain attention on a single task?

elements.name: common_distractions
elements.title: How often do you find yourself distracted when focusing on a task?

elements.name: internal_external_distractions
elements.title: When you lose focus, what is more likely to distract you?

elements.name: attention_in_various_environments
elements.title: Which environment is easiest for you to focus in?

elements.name: task_variety_and_attention
elements.title: Do you find it easier to focus on tasks that are varied or repetitive?

elements.name: time_of_day_for_focus
elements.title: What time of day do you find it easiest to focus?

elements.name: mind_wandering_tendency
elements.title: How often do you find your mind wandering when you're trying to focus on a task?

elements.name: focus_and_task_engagement
elements.title: How often do you find yourself needing to take breaks or shift focus during tasks that require extended concentration?
elements.maxRateDescription: Frequently take breaks or switch tasks

elements.name: ease_of_staying_focused
elements.title: I have an easy time staying focused when I apply myself.

completedHtml: Thank you for completing the Attention Assessment!
